page.title: 17RECREATION
page.content:
{THERE ARE ALMOST NO AMMENITIES FOR {RECREATION IN THE AREA.}THE ONLY SOCIAL MEETING PLACE IS THE PUB ON THE EDGE OF THE SQUARE. THE ONLY OTHER PLACE IS A SMALL PLAYGROUND. THE NEAREST LARGE PLAYING FIELDS ARE IN{HOLT. SHERINGHAM}HAS A GOLF COURSE, SOME PLAYING FIELDS AND THE LITTLE THEATRE.{CROMER}HAS A CINEMA, AND IN SUMMER A LIVE SHOW ON THE PIER.{BODHAM HAS A FIELD WHICH IS USED FOR CRICKET IN SUMMER AND FOOTBALL IN WINTER. THIS SQUARE WHICH WE HAVE STUDIED DISPLAYED A LACK OF RECREATION FACILITIES FOR ITS LARGE AREA
{G. TOONE
